name: agentex_build_agent
description: Build new AI agents using AgentEX. Describe what you want the agent to do, and AgentEX will create it with all necessary components and code.

function.name: agentex_build_agent
function.description: Build a new AI agent using AgentEX. You can specify the agent's purpose, brain/LLM, tools, and deployment target. The agent will be created with all necessary code and configuration.

description.description: Natural language description of what the agent should do. Be specific about the agent's purpose, capabilities, and use case. Example: 'A customer support agent that answers questions about products, uses web search to find current information, and can post updates to Twitter'

name.description: A descriptive name for the new agent. Use PascalCase or descriptive names like 'CustomerSupportAgent', 'ResearchAssistant', 'TradingBot'

brain.description: The LLM/brain to power the agent

tools.description: List of tools/capabilities the agent should have. Options: web-search (search the web), code-execution (run Python code), blockchain-query (query blockchain data), token-price (get crypto prices), twitter-post (post to Twitter), agent-builder (build other agents - enables recursive agent creation)

runtime.description: Where the agent should be deployed

installation.instructions: Add this function to your agent's tool list. The agent can then call agentex_build_agent() to create new agents.

input.description: A research assistant that uses Claude Sonnet 4, web search, and deploys to Vercel
input.name: ResearchAssistant
